title: Learn NodeJS runtime for JavaScript in 2022
metadesc: Learn NodeJS with mubashshir Ali it is very very easy
content:
Learning the backened is now very easy with Node Js, Node Js is a runtime for JavaScript that allow JavaScript to operate as a backened language by which you can create APIs like this one.
Though this api is not made through Node Js but Next Js that is the framework for the React Js library for JavaScript.
author: Mubashshir Ali
